properties.description: Description Custom Manual - MCSB Baseline item BR-1 for Azure Stack Edge
properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item BR-1 for Azure Stack Edge

features.featureDescription: The service can be backed up by the Azure Backup service.
features.featureGuidance: Periodic backups of your Azure Stack Edge device are recommended and can be performed with Azure Backup and other third-party data protection solutions to protect the data contained in the virtual machines deployed on the device. Third-party data protection solutions such as Cohesity, Commvault, and Veritas can also provide a backup solution for the data in the local SMB or NFS shares.

features.featureDescription: Service supports its own native backup capability (if not using Azure Backup).
features.featureGuidance: This feature is not supported to secure this service.
